dn16:1.1.5: ucchecchāmi → ucchejjāmi (s1-3, km, pts1) | ucchijjāmi (mr), anayabyasanaṃ āpādessāmī”ti → āpādessāmi vajjīti (bj) | āpādessāmi vajjinti (s1-3, km)
dn16:1.4.12: garuṃ karonti → garukaronti (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
dn16:1.5.8: Akaraṇīyāva → akaraṇīyā ca (bj, s1-3, km, mr)
dn16:1.16.7: te → kiṃ nu (s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
dn16:1.16.10: pana te → kiṃ pana (s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
dn16:1.17.6: Tassa evamassa → na passeyya tassa evamassa (s1-3, km)
dn16:1.21.1: sabbasanthariṃ → sabba­san­tha­ri­taṃ santhataṃ (s1-3, km) | sabbasanthariṃ santhataṃ (mr)
dn16:1.26.2: sahasseva → sahas­sa­sahas­seva (bj udānaṭṭhakathā) | sahassasseva (pts1, mr) | sahassaseva (ṭīkāyaṃ pāṭhantaraṃ)
dn16:1.27.5: kho → ko nu kho (bj, s1-3, km, pts1, mr), māpentī”ti → māpeti (si) | māpetīti (s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
dn16:1.34.5: Kullañhi jano bandhati → kullaṃ hi jano pabandhati (bj, pts1, mr) | kullaṃ jano ca bandhati (s1-3, km)
dn16:2.7.14: Sādhikā navuti → chādhikā navuti (s1-3) | nādhikā navuti (km)
dn16:2.8.2: Tasmiṃyeva → tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kho (s1-3, km) | tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ce (pts1)
dn16:2.16.6: evamahaṃ taṃ → evaṃ mahantaṃ (bj, pts1) | evaṃpi mahantaṃ (s1-3, km)
dn16:2.16.8: jitamha → jitamhā (bahūsu), vata bho ambakāya, jitamha vata bho ambakāyā”ti → \
dn16:2.25.11: veṭhamissakena → vek­kha­mis­sa­kena (bj) | veḷumissakena (s1-3, km) | veghamissakena (pts1) | vekhamissakena (mr)
dn16:3.10.2: salomahaṃso → lomahaṃso (s1-3, km) | lomahaṃsano (pts1), devadundubhiyo → devadundabhiyo (s1-3) | devadudrabhiyo (mr)
dn16:3.48.1: paṭikacceva → paṭigacceva (bj, pts1), etaṃ → evaṃ (s1-3, km, pts1)
dn16:3.51.8: satthā → ito paraṃ s1-3 potthakesu evampi pāṭho dissati--\
dn16:4.8.6: osaranti → otaranti (bj, pts1), osāriyamānāni → otāriyamānāni (bj, pts1)
dn16:4.27.13: apisu → apissu (bj) | api hi (s1-3, km, pts1)
dn16:4.29.1: aṭṭha vā sakaṭasatāni nava vā sakaṭasatāni → nava vā sakaṭasatāni dasa vā sakaṭasatāni (s1-3, km, pts1)
dn16:4.37.2: hataccikaṃ viya → vītaccikaṃ viya (bj, pts1) | hatacchikaṃ viya (s1-3)
dn16:4.41.5: Nhatvā ca pivitvā cudatāri satthā → nhātvā ca pivitvā cudakāni sutvā (s1-3) | nahatvā pitvā cudatāri satthā (pts1) | pivitvā ca uttari (mr)
dn16:4.42.8: samasamaphalā → samaphalā (bj) | samā samaphalā (mr), samavipākā → samasamavipākā (s1-3, km, pts1)
dn16:5.3.9: apaciyati → idaṃ padaṃ bj, s1-3, km, pts1 potthakesu na
dn16:5.6.2: chinnapātaṃ papatanti → chinnaṃpādaṃ viya papatanti (s1-3) | chinnapātaṃ viyapapatanti (km) | chinnapapātaṃ papatanti (pts1)
dn16:5.7.1: vassaṃvuṭṭhā → vassaṃ vutthā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
dn16:5.10.3: ghaṭatha anuyuñjatha → sadat­tha­manu­yuj­ja­tha (bj) | sadatthe anuyuñjatha (s1-3, km) | sadattham anuyuñjatha (pts1) | sāratthe anuyuñjatha (mr), sāratthe → sadatthe (bj, s1-3, pts1)
dn16:6.11.7: bhante, āyasmā anuruddho devatā manasi karotī”ti → bhante anuruddha devatā manasi karoti (bj) | bhante anuruddha devatā manasika­ron­tīti (s1-3, km, mr)
dn16:6.23.6: dveva dussāni na ḍayhiṃsu → dveva dussāni ḍayhiṃsu (si, s1-3, km, pts1)
dn16:6.28.15: Taṃ vandatha → taṃ taṃ vandatha (s1-3, km)
